integerPropertyWithDefault.description: An integer property with a default value.

numberPropertyWithDefault.description: A number property with a default value.

stringPropertyWithDefault.description: A string property with a default value.

booleanPropertyWithTrueDefault.description: A Boolean property with a true default value.

booleanPropertyWithFalseDefault.description: A Boolean property with a false default value.

nonPrimitivePropertyWithDefault.description: A non-primitive property with a default value: DefaultValue attribute will -not- be emitted.
